extends AlertConfigGenericDevice

      • sendNotification

        public AlertConfigGenericDeviceTransmissionTranscript sendNotification(AlertConfig alertConfig,
                                                              AlertConfigGenericNotification genericNotification)
        Description copied from class: AlertConfigGenericDevice
        Transmit an alert notification and return the transcript about the transmission.
        Note: this method must also be able to transmit an AlertConfigGenericCancelableNotification. The real implementation must use instanceof to check for cancelable notifications.
        Specified by:
        sendNotification in class AlertConfigGenericDevice
        genericNotification - the alert notification (instanceof AlertConfigGenericNotification or instanceof AlertConfigGenericCancelableNotification)
        Returns:
        the transcript about the transmission
        See Also:
        AlertConfigGenericNotification, AlertConfigGenericCancelableNotification
